memberdef.name: SPDLOG_LOGGER_CATCH
memberdef.initializer: catch (const std::exception &ex) \ { \ if (location.filename) \ { \ err_handler_(fmt_lib::format("{} [{}({})]", ex.what(), location.filename, location.line)); \ } \ else \ { \ err_handler_(ex.what()); \ } \ } \ catch (...) \ { \ err_handler_("Rethrowing unknown exception in logger"); \ throw; \ }
